channel.title: Abandoned Scorpions
channel.description:
# Abandoned Scorpions
![image|320x320, 100%](upload://3MYYGSUlDexZzJY5i6gAoeI2Bkt.png)
> A collection of 10,000 unique pixelart scorpions living on the Radix DLT. *Abandoned* because they were supposed to be created for another ledger technology with complicated smart contracts, so the owner decided to move them to Radix. **Price of each NFT**: 20 XRD **Links:** * [Website](https://radstrike.com/scorpions/) * [How to mint](https://radstrike.com/scorpions/about/#instructions) * [Policy](https://radstrike.com/scorpions/policy/#policy) **Social:** * [Telegram](https://t.me/AbandonedScorpions) * [Twitter](https://twitter.com/AbandonedScorps)

item.title: Abandoned Scorpions

item.description:
Abandoned Scorpions

A collection of 10,000 unique pixelart scorpions living on the Radix DLT. Abandoned because they were supposed to be created for another ledger technology with complicated smart contracts, so the owner decided to move them to Radix.

Price of each NFT: 20 XRD
